评论详情: Ordered the white and blue for use as a cover up for my white bikini. This is more of a cream and the blue is not as vibrant.

Super cute! I bought these for a trip to the Caribbean. I only travel with a carry on so space is coveted. These were very light and kinda see through but it’s a beach coverup so I didn’t care. They didn’t take up any space at all. I could leave it long and open on the beach or when going into eat or walking around I pulled the front up and tied it. I pulled it through the opposite belt loops so it crossed in the front and covered up the girls. Don’t know how long it will last because it’s super thin material but for the cost I bout 2 different kinds and if the last the year then it’s a great deal. Will order again when these wear out!

I ordered this to wear over a black slip dress and I can’t tell you how many compliments I received. It gives a simple look that little extra something without being too much!! Absolutely love! Worn it with jeans, boots and a T and it did not disappoint.

评论概述: So versatile - my go-to kimono brand!
评论详情: This is my third time purchasing a kimono from this brand.  The designs are so versatile and you can wear them with many different outfits and colors.  I have used them for swimsuit coverups, dress shawls, or with basic shorts/t-shirts.  I am 5'6" and the length hits me around my knees - you can also tie up the sides in front to make it more of a wrap look.  I really like that the material is lightweight, and has a softer feel to it. I do not like a kimono made of chiffon like material because they are too hot for summer wear.  These are wonderful with the perfect blend of weight and breathability.
The color and pattern of this kimono were gorgeous! The quality was nice as well. I will purchase in again in another color.
Perfect for what I needed.  Lightweight and silky, it’s a great piece to layer with!
Colors are beautiful and vibrant, material is thin and light. Perfect for a summer cover up. For reference I’m 5’3” on a good day and size us16

Very much like the picture.  I'm 5'7" so longest part hangs to just above my knee.  Material is light & see through but not as breathable as cotton gauze.  I use it in place of a robe in the summer for around the house, but of course would work as a bathing suit cover up, too.
I love this! Perfect cover up for Jean shorts and leggings!

评论概述: Great accessory to add to your closet
评论详情: Very nice quality.  If you like to have something light weight to cover your arms this is a great stylish way to do it.

I purchased this to wear as a bathing suit coverup on my beach trip and was pretty happy with it.  The length was great, falling at about mid-thigh, the colors are vibrant and give a cute boho, tie dye vibe, and the material is thin so it’s cool enough to wear in those hot beach temperatures.  The only complaint I have is that the neckline and the areas around the sleeves are not reinforced so the material is very easily torn.  I made the mistake of sitting down while the cover was kind of hanging off my shoulders and when I went to lift my arm the material ripped.  Fortunately, the material is very flowy so you can’t really see the damage.
Very cute, but I am 5’6 and it’s just a little bit long.
